dialogue: Well then Hero, anything you'd like to know?
My name is Micah. I am a Devimancer. Someone who specializes in the manifestation and command of demonic entities. I can provide you these services if you need them, at a small cost ofcourse.
Well, that's a question with a lot of answers. But this is the Grand Demonitorium of Yomotsu Hirasaka, seat of the Demon King. You're always welcome here.
Try not to wind up dead, we really can't bring you back again.
